means: 对（自己的所为）感到懊悔或忏悔

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均有"后悔"之意。
means: regret ： 指对已发生或未发生的事或行为表示后悔或婉惜。
repent ： 正式用词，语气较强，指对自己所做的错事或不该做的事感到深切的悔恨。

sentence.Network_en: I am a sinner and I need to repent of my sins.
sentence.Network_cn: 我是个罪人，必须忏悔我的罪过。

sentence.Network_en: Those who refuse to repent, he said, will be punished.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些拒不悔改的人，他说，将会受到惩罚。

sentence.Network_en: Remission of sins is promised to those who repent.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... penitent a 后悔的 repent v 后悔，懊悔 punish v 惩罚.
英语doing与to do的区别_爱问知识人 ... mind 介意 repent 悔悟 miss 错过.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... penitent a 后悔的 repent v 后悔，懊悔 punish v 惩罚.
字典中退字的解释 ... (13) 谦让[ modestly decline] (17) 改悔[ repent] (18) 脱去[ take off ].

list.abs: they repented staying out late .他们后悔在外面逗留得太晚了.
...e stem)。茎平卧地面生长，不能直立，如蒺藜、地锦草(Euphorbia humifusa)等。3.匍匐茎(repent stem)。茎平卧地面生长，但节上生不定根，如甘薯、蛇莓等。4.攀援茎(scandent stem)。茎上发出卷须、吸器等攀援器官，借此使植物攀附于它物上，如葡.
and if he sin against thee seven times in a day , and seven times in a day be converted unto thee , saying , I repent ; forgive him .4如果他一天七次得罪了你，而又七次转向你说：我后悔了，你也得宽恕他。
repent是什么意思... ... 1. repent: 后悔 | 懊悔 | 悔改 | 忏悔 2. repent of: 后悔 | 抱憾 3. Repent Forever: 终生遗憾.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French repentir, from re- (expressing intensive force) + pentir (based on Latin paenitere 'cause to repent')

entry.def: If you repent, you show or say that you are sorry for something wrong you have done.

example.ex: Those who refuse to repent, he said, will be punished...
example.tran: 那些拒不悔改的人，他说，将会受到惩罚。

example.ex: Did he repent of anything in his life?
example.tran: 他一生中有什么后悔的事情吗？

means.word_mean: 1. turn away from sin or do penitence
2. feel remorse for; feel sorry for; be contrite about

auth_sentence.content: Yet what can it when one can not repent?
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet what can it when one can not repent?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet what can it when one can not repent?

auth_sentence.content: Reproch the first, Shame next, Repent behinde.
auth_sentence.res_content: Reproch the first, Shame next, Repent behinde.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Reproch the first, Shame next, Repent behinde.

auth_sentence.content: If they repent their sins, God will still love them.
auth_sentence.res_content: If they repent their sins, God will still love them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If they repent their sins, God will still love them.

stems_affixes.word_buile: peni=pen惩罚;痛苦+t+ent表形容词→受惩罚后而后悔→后悔的
penal[adj.刑事的]+ty表名词→n.处罚,刑罚,惩罚,罚金
pen惩罚;痛苦+ance表名词→n.自我惩罚

stems_affixes.value_cn: 置[某人]于不利地位,处罚
stems_affixes.word_buile: penal[adj.刑事的]+ize表动词→v.置[某人]于不利地位,处罚
re反+pen惩罚;痛苦+t→反过来惩罚[自己]→后悔

means.word_mean: 对(自己的所为)感到懊悔或忏悔

sentences.en: Darren repented having shot the bird.
sentences.cn: 达伦后悔射杀了那只鸟。
